FuncDef: The display access-service command displays information about access service templates.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an access service template.
The name is a string of 1 to 32 case-insensitive characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check the number and names of access service templates, you can run the display access-service command. If a name is specified, the detailed information about the access service template with the specified name will be displayed.
The display access-service service-name command output in the system view is the same as the display access-service command output in the service template view of the specified service-name.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
